milestones.title: AP Computer Science
milestones.description: Took AP Computer Science as soon as possible in High School. Final Project: simple catch falling objects game in Java.

milestones.title: Halite 2
milestones.description: Halite2 programming challenge, wrote Python algorithms.

milestones.title: Graduated High School
milestones.description: Graduated from San Marcos High School.

milestones.title: Halite 3
milestones.description: Halite3 programming challenge, attempted complex pathfinding incorporating A* search algorithm.

milestones.title: Ubuntu 16.04
milestones.description: Switched to Ubuntu 16.04 for programming with VIM on Thinkpad, self-hosting with an added Raspberry Pi 4GB.

milestones.title: Core Coursework Completed
milestones.description: Completed all core university Computer Science classes 100-300 level classes prior to moving to Fullerton and away from school.

milestones.title: First Website
milestones.description: First website created with NodeJS, ExpressJS, vanilla JS, HTML, & CSS. First experience with devops, hosted on Digital Ocean, tinkered with Docker.

milestones.title: Software Test Engineer at Zapways
milestones.description: Began working as Software QA Technician at Zapways in Irvine, CA. Company tech stack included: .NET, Blazor, VueJS, SASS. Tools used: Postman, Selenium, and Redmine. Started refactoring to VueJS during my tenure.

milestones.title: Performance at Zapways
milestones.description: Owned development of automated testing while at Zapways, maintaining three separate systems, Web/OTA/GDS.

milestones.title: Returned to School
milestones.description: Left Zapways and returned to school.

milestones.title: Completed General Education
milestones.description: Completed all undergraduate classes (previously skipped 100-200 level general education classes) at Community College.

milestones.title: Returned to University
milestones.description: Returned to University to complete degree. Tried Linux Mint for a while, but returned to Windows main boot.

milestones.title: AI Model Research
milestones.description: Used and researched all popular Artificial Intelligence models: LR, DT, RF, SVM, KN, NN. Used Google Colab, Gemini, scikit-learn.

milestones.title: DevOps & Cloud Tools
milestones.description: Furthered devops and cloud infrastructure knowledge: used Terraform, Ansible, ANTLR, Conda.

milestones.title: Networking Fundamentals
milestones.description: Learned networking fundamentals: Subnetting, DNS, Routing, Switches, OSI Layers (7).

milestones.title: Capstone Project
milestones.description: Capstone Project: Owned development of tournament system for our USU Web App.

milestones.title: B.S. Computer Science
milestones.description: Earned a Bachelor of Science (B.S.) in Computer Science at California State University San Marcos.

milestones.title: Personal Website
milestones.description: Created this website with ReactJS, TailwindCSS, and Cloudflare.

milestones.title: ACM Hackathon
milestones.description: Won 2nd place in ACM at CSUSM's first hackathon, competing as a solo developer completing four challenges in four hours.
